de.tudarmstadt.ukp.lmf.transform.germanet

Class InterlingualIndexConverter

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.tudarmstadt.ukp.lmf.transform.germanet.InterlingualIndexConverter

  • public class InterlingualIndexConverter
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains methods for converting german Interlingual Index (ILI), provided in GermaNet 7.0, to SenseAxis instances.
    Since:
    UBY 0.2.0
    Author:
    Zijad Maksuti

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      InterlingualIndexConverter(GNConverter gnConverter, de.tuebingen.uni.sfs.germanet.api.GermaNet gnet, Lexicon wordNetLexicon)
      Constructs an instance of InterlingualIndexConverter based on the consumed parameters.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void convert()
      Starts the conversion process of GermaNets Interlingual Index to SenseAxis instances.
      java.util.List<SenseAxis> getSenseAxes()
      Returns the List of all SenseAxis instances, generated by this InterlingualIndexConverter.

    • Constructor Detail

      • InterlingualIndexConverter

        public InterlingualIndexConverter(GNConverter gnConverter,
                          de.tuebingen.uni.sfs.germanet.api.GermaNet gnet,
                          Lexicon wordNetLexicon)
        Constructs an instance of InterlingualIndexConverter based on the consumed parameters.
        Parameters:
        gnConverter - an instance of GNConverter associated with this generator
        gnet - GermaNet instance used for accessing GermaNet data.
        wordNetLexicalResource - LexicalResource instance containing WordNet 3.0.
        Since:
        0.2.0

    • Method Detail

      • convert

        public void convert()
        Starts the conversion process of GermaNets Interlingual Index to SenseAxis instances. The generated sense axes can be obtained by invoking getSenseAxes().

      • getSenseAxes

        public java.util.List<SenseAxis> getSenseAxes()
        Returns the List of all SenseAxis instances, generated by this InterlingualIndexConverter.
        Returns:
        a list of sense axes generated by this converter, or an empty list if the converter has not generated any sense axes
